CORE WORKFLOW

Review Generation Architecture

A deep dive into how we architect, install, and optimize the Review Generation system for maximum ROI in local service businesses.

How The Automation Works

The Blueprint

When designing the Review Generation architecture, our primary objective is stripping out human dependency. Your staff shouldn't be clicking buttons or remembering to send texts—the system detects the required trigger event (like a missed call, a completed job, or an incoming web form) and instantly executes the exact communication protocol required to close the loop.

Trigger ➔ API Webhook fired

Condition ➔ Verify Lead Status in CRM

Action 1 ➔ AI Generates Hyper-Personalized SMS

Action 2 ➔ Delay 3 Minutes ➔ Send

Action 3 ➔ If Reply = Yes ➔ Auto-Book Calendar

The exact amount of time it takes to trigger the first touchpoint. Software doesn't sleep.
